origin.horigins.man.name: Man
origin.horigins.dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.horigins.halfling.name: Halfling
origin.horigins.giant.name: Giant
origin.horigins.dwarf.description: Hardy and short, these are excellent miners, but not quite as heartful as men.
origin.horigins.halfling.description: Short and quick, these are natural acrobats and are great at sneaking around, but are quite frail.
origin.horigins.giant.description: Large and sturdy, these are a model of strength, but the very same strength keeps them grounded.
power.horigins.attack_damage_giant.name: +1.5 Attack Damage
power.horigins.hearts_extra_two.name: +4 Max Health
power.horigins.reach_giant.name: Far Reaching
power.horigins.reach_halfing.name: Short Arms
power.horigins.double_jump_negation.name: Grounded
power.horigins.attack_damage_giant.descr: As a giant, your base strength is increased by 1.5.
power.horigins.attack_damage_halfling.de: As a halfling, your base strength is decreased by 0.3.
power.horigins.double_jump_negation.desc: Due to your overall size, you're unable to learn how to jump while mid-air.
As a halfling, you are naturally acrobatic, +1 Extra Jump.
power.horigins.hearts_extra_two.descript: As a giant, two additional hearts are added to your base health.
power.horigins.hearts_remove_two.descrip: As a halfling, two hearts are removed from your base health.
power.horigins.movement_buff_halfling.de: Due to your lightness, you can move quickly.
power.horigins.movement_debuff_giant.des: Despite your strength, you tend to move and swing your weapons slowly.
power.horigins.reach_giant.description: As a giant, you gain 1.5 blocks to your reach distance overall.
power.horigins.reach_halfing.description: As a halfling, 0.5 blocks are taken from your reach distance overall.
